PrecisOrder (a) consenting to the use by TRANSGAS LIMITED and SASKATCHEWAN POWER CORPORATION of their statutory power to expropriate land on SWEET GRASS INDIAN RESERVE NO. 113-L6, for natural gas transmission pipeline and electrical transmission system purposes, and (b) in lieu of expropriation, granting an easement to the companies for the specified purposes.
